headline: A day closer
description: A brief travel prayer on the eve of arrival‚Äîweariness, hope, and faith carried through the transition into a new place.
author: Unnamed

motifMap.meaning: Faith practiced without feeling; endurance under harsh or artificial light.
The long road of transition‚Äîmovement that still feels unsettled.
Guidance and wonder‚Äîremembered sky as quiet reassurance.
Choosing safety and steadiness‚Äîsleeping near the light while fear remains.
